sentences.en: "Gratification" and "gratitude" have the same etymological root.
sentences.cn: gratification和gratitude的词源相同。

sentences.en: He gave her a gift to betoken his gratitude.
sentences.cn: 他送她一件礼物表示感谢.

sentences.en: He had won her undying gratitude.
sentences.cn: 他让她感念一生。

sentences.en: He smiled at them with gratitude .
sentences.cn: 他向他们笑了笑表示谢意。

sentences.en: He smiled at them with gratitude.
sentences.cn: 他向他们笑了笑表示谢意。

sentences.en: Her arms tightened about his neck in gratitude.
sentences.cn: 她充满感激，把他的脖子搂得更紧了。

sentences.en: I can hardly express my gratitude to you for your help.
sentences.cn: 对于你的帮助,我几乎难以表达我的谢意.

sentences.en: I cherish for you the liveliest feeling of affection and gratitude.
sentences.cn: 我对你怀有最强烈的爱和感激之情。

sentences.en: I have expressed the depth of my gratitude to him.
sentences.cn: 我向他表示了深切的谢意.

sentences.en: I owe a big debt of gratitude to her.
sentences.cn: 我对她万分感激。

sentences.en: I think our main feeling would be of an immense gratitude.
sentences.cn: 我觉得充斥我们心中的将是一种强烈的感激之情。

sentences.en: Klein's most important work is called "Envy and Gratitude"
sentences.cn: 克莱因最重要的著作名为《嫉妒与感激》。

sentences.en: Relief and gratitude were written all over his face.
sentences.cn: 他一脸释然与感激。

sentences.en: She could not help her tears of gratitude rolling down her face.
sentences.cn: 她感激的泪珠禁不住沿着面颊流了下来.

sentences.en: She showed me her gratitude by inviting me to dinner.
sentences.cn: 她请我吃饭以表谢意.

sentences.en: She smiled, politely rather than with tenderness or gratitude.
sentences.cn: 她只是出于礼貌地笑了笑，而非出于关心或感激。

sentences.en: Tears of gratitude filled her eyes.
sentences.cn: 她眼里充满感激的泪水。

sentences.en: The word " gratitude " did not occur in his words.
sentences.cn: “ 感激 ” 两字在他的话中是见不到的.

sentences.en: To my father I dedicate this volume in token of affection and gratitude.
sentences.cn: 我谨以此书献给我的父亲， 以表示对他的爱戴和感激之情。

sentences.en: To my teacher I dedicate this dictionary in token of affection and gratitude.
sentences.cn: 我谨以此词典献给我的老师，以表示对他的爱戴和感激之情。

trans.tran_cn: 感激，感谢，感激的样子，谢意，恩义
